title: CNN Turns Mixed Race Oregon Shooter into a White Man
text: Posts: 1,420 CNN Turns Mixed Race Oregon Shooter into a White Man Posts: 1,420 They did this to George Zimmerman too... Liberals need to lie and immorally label people as racist, when in reality, they are the racists. Pure rubbish. Get a grip. Talent on loan from god Pure rubbish. Get a grip. There doesn't seem to be a grip that guy can get. Originally Posted by Camelot There doesn't seem to be a grip that guy can get. But, but, what about the whole "pull yerselves up by yer bootstraps" theory? If we can expect people without boots to do that, then we can surely expect these types to get a grip on something.
